message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and unparalleled performance, it's truly a game-changer in its field. I believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I propose a price of $15000 for this product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its features and benefits.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your budget constraints. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $12000 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while being more accessible to you.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $12000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it would bring to my business.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm glad we're able to continue this discussion. After reviewing the situation, I'm willing to consider your proposal. I propose a final price of $10000 for the product. This aligns closely with your offer and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
